name: DeployMessage

fields.name: changed
fields.description: Determines whether the component was changed after deployment. If true, the component was changed as a result of the deployment. If false, the deployed component was the same as the corresponding component already in the org.

fields.name: columnNumber
fields.description: Each component is represented by a text file. If an error occurs during deployment, this property represents the column of the text file where the error occurred.

fields.name: componentType
fields.description: The metadata type of the component in the deployment.

fields.name: created
fields.description: If true, the component was created as a result of the deployment. If false, the component was modified as a result of the deployment.

fields.name: createdDate
fields.description: The date and time when the component was created as a result of the deployment.

fields.name: deleted
fields.description: If true, the component was deleted as a result of the deployment. If false, the component was either new or modified as result of the deployment.

fields.name: fileName
fields.description: The name of the file in the metadata archive used to deploy the component.

fields.name: fullName
fields.description: Full name for the custom metadata component.

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID of the component that was deployed.

fields.name: lineNumber
fields.description: Each component is represented by a text file. If an error occurs during deployment, this field represents the line number of the text file where the error occurred.

fields.name: problem
fields.description: If an error or warning occurred, this field contains a description of the problem that caused the deployment to fail.

fields.name: problemType
fields.description: Indicates the problem type, for example, an error or warning.

fields.name: success
fields.description: Indicates whether the component was successfully deployed (true) or not (false).

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.DeployMessage.

description: Represents result information for the deployment of a metadata
